original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart ye shall take my offering.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 명령하여 내게 예물을 가져오라 하고 기쁜 마음으로 내는 자가 내게 바치는 모든 것을 너희는 받을지니라

sentences.original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel
that they bring me an offering
of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart
